text: Lei Cheng Uk () is one of the 25 constituencies in the Sham Shui Po District of Hong Kong which was created in 1994. The constituency loosely covers Lei Cheng Uk Estate in Sham Shui Po with the estimated population of 13,336. == Councillors represented == {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color:" | | 1994 | rowspan=2| Fu Shu-wan | SSPRA |- |style="background-color:" | | 199? | DAB |- |style="background-color: " | | 2003 | Kwun Sai-leung | ADPL |- |style="background-color: " | | 2011 | Chan Keng-chau | KWND |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | Kong Kwai-sang | ADPL |- |} == Election results == ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sham Shui Po District Council Category:1994 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1994 Category:Sham Shui Po
title: Lei Cheng Uk (constituency)
